articles.description: JOHNSON CITY, Tenn. (WJHL) — Many people receive presents in the form of material items, but this Christmas, one local mother received the best gift of all — the gift of life after giving birth to 2.47-pound Parker Danny Wayne Ball. News Channel 11 reached ou…

articles.author: Karen Brettell
articles.title: Euro beats yen, sterling as Brexit, U.S. stimulus boost risk appetite - Reuters
articles.description: The euro was boosted on Monday as risk sentiment improved in the wake of Britain's trade deal with the European Union and U.S. President Donald Trump's decision to approve a new fiscal stimulus package.

articles.title: British government plans to approve Oxford vaccine, distribute starting Jan. 4 - Fox News
articles.description: The plan to distribute the vaccine includes both the Pfizer and Oxford vaccines.
articles.content:
The Oxford COVID-19vaccine will be distributed across the U.K. starting January 4 if it is approved, according to a report by the Sunday Telegraph.
